source:
This sample compares the performance of an AMPHTML ad vs a regular ad. To best compare these two, either view this page on a mobile device with active 3G connection or, if you are on Desktop, enable network throttling in Chrome Dev Tools (e.g. "Regular 3G").

AMPHTML ad

Regular ad

sections.doc_: ## Introduction This sample compares the performance of an AMPHTML ad vs a regular ad. To best compare these two, either view [the demo page](http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/advertising-analytics/amphtml_ads_vs_non_amp_ads/preview/index.html) on a mobile device with an active 3G connection or, on desktop, enable network throttling in Chrome Dev Tools (e.g. "Regular 3G"). An AMPHTML ad is an one where the ad is written in AMP HTML. A valid AMPHTML ad does not contain arbitrary JavaScript. All JavaScript in an AMPHTML ad comes from the open source AMP project which is blessed by the AMP project maintainers. As a result, when an ad is created in AMP, it is always guaranteed to do the right thing from a user experience standpoint.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

This sample compares the performance of an AMPHTML ad vs a regular ad. To best compare these two, either view the demo page on a mobile device with an active 3G connection or, on desktop, enable network throttling in Chrome Dev Tools (e.g. "Regular 3G").

An AMPHTML ad is an one where the ad is written in AMP HTML. A valid AMPHTML ad does not contain arbitrary JavaScript. All JavaScript in an AMPHTML ad comes from the open source AMP project which is blessed by the AMP project maintainers. As a result, when an ad is created in AMP, it is always guaranteed to do the right thing from a user experience standpoint.

To best compare these two, either view [the demo page](http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/advertising-analytics/amphtml_ads_vs_non_amp_ads/preview/index.html) on a mobile device with an active 3G connection or, on desktop, enable network throttling in Chrome Dev Tools (e.g. "Regular 3G"). An AMPHTML ad is an one where the ad is written in AMP HTML. A valid AMPHTML ad does not contain arbitrary JavaScript. All JavaScript in an AMPHTML ad comes from the open source AMP project which is blessed by the AMP project maintainers. As a result, when an ad is created in AMP, it is always guaranteed to do the right thing from a user experience standpoint.

sections.preview:
This sample compares the performance of an AMPHTML ad vs a regular ad. To best compare these two, either view this page on a mobile device with active 3G connection or, if you are on Desktop, enable network throttling in Chrome Dev Tools (e.g. "Regular 3G").

AMPHTML ad

sections.doc_: The ad unit serves an AMPHTML ad profiting from the optimized AMPHTML ad delivery.
sections.normalizedDoc_: The ad unit serves an AMPHTML ad profiting from the optimized AMPHTML ad delivery.

sections.doc_: This ad unit serves a regular ad.
sections.normalizedDoc_: This ad unit serves a regular ad.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>AMP Ads vs non-AMP Ads</title>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/advertising-analytics/amphtml_ads_vs_non_amp_ads/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: AMP Ads vs non-AMP Ads
document._description: This sample compares the performance of an AMPHTML ad vs a regular ad.
